context_snippet:
def test_rmdir_can_remove_bucket(s3_mock):
    s3 = boto3.resource('s3')
    bucket = S3Path('/test-bucket/')
    bucket.mkdir()
    assert bucket.exists()
    bucket.rmdir()
    assert not bucket.exists()
